hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Ganons Castle Forest Trial Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Hylian Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prelude of Light#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Nothing#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Nothing# and #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Milk Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Before Heavy Block Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.
